title: Preet Gill – 2021 Comments on Foreign Aid
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Preet Gill, the Shadow Secretary of State for International Development, on 26 April 2021.
content:
Last week the Foreign Secretary exposed his fear of scrutiny by trying to sneak out a written statement on his callous aid cuts
